Absolute Cinema

Absolute Cinema is an Internet meme used several times by Nekori on the Internet. The meme has been influential on the NekoCulture to the point of getting on a list.

The meme started [on the context of the NekoCulture] in early 2025 on a Discord server Nekori was in.
